name: Duck The Game
description:
🏁 WIN THE GAME

Your goal is to guide each duckling to the house 🏠

🐥 RESCUE THE PATITOS
Get close to the ducklings so that they follow you to the finish line, careful not to lead them astray 😰

🐍 EVADE ENEMIES
Some enemies may follow you, you must be aware that they do not corner you. Be smart and guide them to the peaks to get rid of them 😈
